00112 template<class O_DataType>
00113 pair<int,int> O_learner::suffix(O_state* statein, O_DataType* datain)
00114 {
00115         int j,k;
00116         pair<int,int> suffixout;
00117         O_state* butlast = (*oracle)[statein->get_statenb()-1];
00118         j = butlast->get_statenb();
00120         if(butlast->get_suffix().first)
00121                 k = butlast->get_suffix().first->get_statenb();
00122         else
00123                 k = -1;
00124         while (k>=0 && search_trans(*oracle->state_vect[k], *datain)==-1)
00125         {
00126                 oracle->state_vect[k]->add_trans(statein);
00127                 j = k;
00128                 if(oracle->state_vect[k]->get_suffix().first)
00129                         k = oracle->state_vect[k]->get_suffix().first->get_statenb();
00130                 else
00131                         k = -1;
00132         }
00133         if (k==-1)
00134                 suffixout.first = 0;
00135         else
00136                 suffixout.first = search_trans(*oracle->state_vect[k], *datain);
00137         
00139         suffixout.second = lrs(*(*oracle)[j],*(*oracle)[suffixout.first]); // lrs
00140     
00142         list<pair<O_state*, int> > rsufflist = oracle->state_vect[suffixout.first]->get_rsuff();
00143         list<pair<O_state*, int> >::iterator rsuffit;
00144         for (rsuffit=rsufflist.begin(); rsuffit!=rsufflist.end(); rsuffit++)
00145         {
00146                 if ((*rsuffit).second == suffixout.second)
00147                 {
00148                         if (*(O_DataType*)(*data)[(*rsuffit).first->get_statenb()-(*rsuffit).second] == *(O_DataType*)(*data)[statein->get_statenb()-(*rsuffit).second])
00149                         {
00150                                 suffixout.first=(*rsuffit).first->get_statenb();
00151                                 suffixout.second++;
00152                                 break;
00153                                 //cout << "found better: "<<(*rsuffit).first->get_statenb()<<"<--"<<statein->get_statenb()<<endl;
00154                         }
00155                 }
00156         }
00157     
00159         return suffixout;
00160 }

00163 // build
00165 template<class O_DataType>
00166 int O_learner::add(O_DataType & dataIn)
00167 {
00168         // initialisation if needed
00169         if (oracle->state_vect.size()<1)
00170         {
00171                 oracle->start();
00172                 data->start<O_DataType>();
00173         }
00174         
00175         //int j,k,l;
00176         int newstatenb;
00177         
00178         O_state * O_it = oracle->state_vect.back(); // old last
00179         newstatenb = O_it->get_statenb()+1; // new number
00180         
00181         // create new data
00182         O_DataType * newdata = new O_DataType(dataIn);
00183         ((O_label*)newdata)->set_statenb(newstatenb);
00184         data->state_vect.push_back((O_label*)newdata); // add
00185         data->size = data->state_vect.size(); // update size
00186         data->add_state(*newdata); // add state to hashtable
00187         data->add_date(*newdata); // add date to hashtable
00188         
00189         // create new state
00190         O_state * newstate = new O_state(newstatenb, ((O_label*)newdata)->get_bufferef());
00191         oracle->state_vect.push_back(newstate); // add
00192         oracle->size = oracle->state_vect.size(); // update size
00193         
00194         // basic transition
00195         O_it->add_trans(newstate);
00196         
00197         // suffix algorithm
00198         pair<int,int> newsuffix=suffix(newstate, newdata); //<LRS inside
00199         
00200         //int lrsnew = lrs(*(*oracle)[j],*(*oracle)[l]); // lrs
00201         oracle->state_vect.back()->set_suffix((*oracle)[newsuffix.first],newsuffix.second);
00202         
00203         // reversed suffix
00204         pair<O_state*,int> * rsuff = new pair<O_state*,int>(newstate,newsuffix.second);
00205         oracle->state_vect[newsuffix.first]->add_rsuff(*rsuff);
00206         
00208         return (newstatenb);
00209 }
00210 
00212 template<class O_DataType>
00213 int O_learner::addfrom(O_DataType * dataIn)
00214 {
00215         // initialisation if needed
00216         if (oracle->state_vect.size()<1)
00217         {
00218                 oracle->start();
00219                 data->start<O_DataType>();
00220         }
00221         
00222         int newstatenb;
00223         
00224         O_state * O_it = oracle->state_vect.back(); // old last
00225         newstatenb = O_it->get_statenb()+1; // new number
00226         
00227         O_label * last_data = (O_label *)(data->state_vect.back());
00228 
00229         // add existing data
00231         int newdate =last_data->get_duration()+data->get_date(last_data->get_statenb());
00232         data->add<O_DataType>(newdate,(O_label*)dataIn);
00233         
00234         // create new state
00235         O_state * newstate = new O_state(newstatenb, ((O_label*)dataIn)->get_bufferef());
00236         oracle->state_vect.push_back(newstate); // add
00237         oracle->size = oracle->state_vect.size(); // update size
00238         
00239         // basic transition
00240         O_it->add_trans(newstate);
00241         
00242         // suffix algorithm
00243         pair<int,int> newsuffix = suffix(newstate, dataIn); //<<LRS inside
00244         
00245         // set the suffix
00246         oracle->state_vect.back()->set_suffix((*oracle)[newsuffix.first],newsuffix.second);
00247         
00248         // reversed suffix
00249         pair<O_state*,int> * rsuff = new pair<O_state*,int>(newstate,newsuffix.second);
00250         oracle->state_vect[newsuffix.first]->add_rsuff(*rsuff);
00251         
00253         return (newstatenb);
00254 }

00257 template<class O_DataType>
00258 int O_learner::search_trans(O_state & statein, O_DataType & dataIn)
00259 {
00260         int intout = -1;
00261         bool found = false;
00262         list<O_state*> thistrans = statein.get_trans();
00263         list<O_state*>::iterator transit;
00264         for (transit = thistrans.begin(); (!found) && (transit != thistrans.end()); transit++)
00265         {
00266                 if ((*(O_DataType*)(*data)[(*transit)->get_statenb()]) == dataIn) // Comparison
00267                 {
00268                         intout = (*transit)->get_statenb();
00269                         found = true;
00270                 }
00271         }
00273         return intout;
00274 }
00275 
00277 int O_learner::lrs(O_state & state1, O_state & state2)
00278 {
00279         if(state2.get_statenb() == 0)
00280                 return 0;
00281         else
00282         {
00283                 O_state * pi2 = (*oracle)[state2.get_statenb()-1];
00284                 if (pi2->get_statenb() == state1.get_suffix().first->get_statenb())
00285                         return(state1.get_suffix().second + 1);
00286                 else
00287                 {
00288                         while (pi2->get_suffix().first != state1.get_suffix().first)
00289                                 pi2 = pi2->get_suffix().first;
00290                         if (state1.get_suffix().second> pi2->get_suffix().second)
00291                                 return(pi2->get_suffix().second + 1);
00292                         else
00293                                 return(state1.get_suffix().second + 1);
00295                 }
00296         }
00297 }
